element-citation.article-title: Application of mixture design for optimum antioxidant activity of mixtures of essential oils from Ocimum basilicum L., Origanum majorana L. and Rosmarinus officinalis L

ref.mixed-citation: Baj, T., Baryluk, A., Sieniawska, E., 2018. Application of mixture design for optimum antioxidant activity of mixtures of essential oils from Ocimum basilicum L., Origanum majorana L. and Rosmarinus officinalis L. Ind Crops Prod. 115, 52-61.
